hero.title: One Platform.
hero.subtitle: Luhive brings your community together in one powerful, unified platform.

about.title: The Future of Community Management
about.description: We're building the ultimate community platform for verified organizations. Starting in Azerbaijan, scaling globally.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Communities today are fragmented. Event management happens on Google Forms. Announcements are scattered across Telegram, WhatsApp, and Discord. Feedback gets lost in the noise.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: Luhive brings everything together — events, communication, feedback, and community engagement — all in one beautifully designed platform.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.description: Verified communities that want real connections and zero chaos. From tech communities to educational organizations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Starting in Azerbaijan, scaling globally. We're building a platform that empowers communities worldwide to connect, engage, and thrive together. Our mission is to break down barriers, foster meaningful connections, and create spaces where every community can flourish—no matter where they are.

features.title: Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

unifiedEvents.title: Unified Event Management
unifiedEvents.description: Create, manage, and track events effortlessly. No more Google Forms. Just one powerful system that works.

centralizedComm.title: Centralized Communication
centralizedComm.description: Say goodbye to scattered chats. All your community conversations, announcements, and updates in one place.

smartFeedback.title: Smart Feedback System
smartFeedback.description: Collect, organize, and act on community feedback. Never lose a suggestion or request again.

verified.title: Verified Communities
verified.description: Join authentic, verified communities. Build trust and credibility with official community badges.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Understand your community better with powerful analytics. Track engagement, growth, and member activity.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your community's data is safe with us. Enterprise-grade security meets user-friendly design.

contact.title: Be Part of the Future
contact.description: Have questions? Want to learn more about Luhive? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.description: Building the future of community management.
